GK19kmeghvpu:0: kaś cit kāntāvirahaguruṇā svādhikārapramattaḥ śāpenāstaṅgamitamahimā varṣabhogyeṇa bhartuḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:1: yakṣaś cakre janakatanayāsnānapuṇyodakeṣu snigdhacchāyātaruṣu vasatiṃ rāmagiryāśrameṣu // KMdV_1 //
GK19kmeghvpu:2: tasminn adrau kati cid abalāviprayuktaḥ sa kāmī nītvā māsān kanakavalayabhraṃśariktaprakoṣṭhaḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:3: āṣāḍhasya praśamadivase megham āśliṣṭasānuṃ vaprakrīḍāpariṇatagajaprekṣaṇīyaṃ dadarśa // KMdV_2
GK19kmeghvpu:4: tasya sthitvā katham api puraḥ ketakādhānahetor antarbāṣpaś ciram anucaro rājarājasya dadhyau
GK19kmeghvpu:5: meghāloke bhavati sukhino 'py anyathāvṛtti cetaḥ kaṇṭhāśleṣapraṇayini jane kiṃ punar dūrasaṃsthe pratyāsanne nabhasi dayitājīvitālambanārthī jīmūtena svakuśalamayīṃ hārayiṣyan pravṛttim /
GK19kmeghvpu:6: sa pratyagraiḥ kuṭajakusumaiḥ kalpitārghāya tasmai prītaḥ prītipramukhavacanaṃ svāgataṃ vyājahāra dhūmajyotiḥsalilamarutāṃ saṃnipātaḥ kva meghaḥ saṃdeśārthāḥ kva paṭukaraṇaiḥ prāṇibhiḥ prāpaṇīyāḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:7: ity autsukyād aparigaṇayan guhyakas taṃ yayāce kāmārtā hi praṇayakṛpaṇāś cetanācetaneṣu // KMdV_5 //
GK19kmeghvpu:8: jātaṃ vaṃśe bhuvanavidite puṣkarāvartakānāṃ jānāmi tvāṃ prakṛtipuruṣaṃ kāmarūpaṃ maghonaḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:9: tenārthitvaṃ tvayi vidhivaśād dūrabandhur gato 'haṃ yācñā vandhyā varam
GK19kmeghvpu:11: saṃtaptānāṃ tvam asi śaraṇaṃ tat payoda priyāyāḥ saṃdeśaṃ me hara dhanapatikrodhaviśleṣitasya
GK19kmeghvpu:12: gantavyā te vasatir alakā nāma yakṣeśvarāṇāṃ bāhyodyānasthitaharaśiraścandrikādhautaharmyā tvām ārūḍhaṃ pavanapadavīm udgṛhītālakāntāḥ prekṣiṣyante pathikavanitāḥ pratyayād āśvasantyaḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:13: kaḥ saṃnaddhe virahavidhurāṃ tvayy upekṣeta jāyāṃ na syād anyo 'py aham iva jano yaḥ parādhīnavṛttiḥ āpṛcchasva priyasakham amuṃ tuṅgam āliṅgya śailaṃ vandyaiḥ puṃsāṃ raghupatipadair aṅkitaṃ mekhalāsu /
GK19kmeghvpu:14: kāle kāle bhavati bhavatā yasya saṃyogam etya snehavyaktiś ciravirahajaṃ muñcato bāṣpam uṣṇam mandaṃ mandaṃ nudati pavanaś cānukūlo yathā tvāṃ vāmaś cāyaṃ nadati madhuraṃ cātakas toyagṛdhnuḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:15: garbhādhānasthiraparicayā nūnam ābaddhamālāḥ seviṣyante nayanasubhagaṃ khe bhavantaṃ balākāḥ tāṃ cāvaśyaṃ divasagaṇanātatparām ekapatnīm avyāpannām avihatagatir drakṣyasi bhrātṛjāyām
GK19kmeghvpu:16: āśābandhaḥ kusumasadṛśaṃ prāyaśo hy aṅganānāṃ sadyaḥpātapraṇayi hṛdayaṃ viprayoge ruṇaddhi kartuṃ yac ca prabhavati mahīm ucchilindhrām avandhyaṃ tac chrutvā te śravaṇasubhagaṃ garjitaṃ mānasotkāḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:17: ā kailāsād bisakisalayacchedapātheyavantaḥ saṃpatsyante nabhasi bhavato rājahaṃsāḥ sahāyāḥ mārgaṃ tāvac chṛṇu kathayatas tvatprayāṇānukūlaṃ saṃdeśaṃ me tadanu jalada śroṣyasi śrotrapeyam
GK19kmeghvpu:18: khinnaḥ khinnaḥ śikhariṣu padaṃ nyasya gantāsi yatra kṣīṇaḥ kṣīṇaḥ parilaghu payaḥ srotasāṃ copabhujya // KMdV_13 //
GK19kmeghvpu:19: adreḥ śṛṅgaṃ harati pavanaḥ kiṃ svid ity unmukhībhir dṛṣṭotsāhaś cakitacakitaṃ mugdhasiddhāṅganābhiḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:20: sthānād asmāt sarasaniculād utpatodaṅmukhaḥ khaṃ diṅnāgānāṃ pathi pariharan sthūlahastāvalehān ratnacchāyāvyatikara iva prekṣyam etat purastād valmīkāgrāt prabhavati dhanuṣkhaṇḍam ākhaṇḍalasya
GK19kmeghvpu:21: yena śyāmaṃ vapur atitarāṃ kāntim āpatsyate te barheṇeva sphuritarucinā gopaveśasya viṣṇoḥ tvayy āyattaṃ kṛṣiphalam iti bhrūvilāsānabhijñaiḥ prītisnigdhair janapadavadhūlocanaiḥ pīyamānaḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:22: sadyaḥsīrotkaṣaṇasurabhi kṣetram āruhya mālaṃ kiṃ cit paścād pravalaya gatiṃ bhūya evottareṇa tvām āsārapraśamitavanopaplavaṃ sādhu mūrdhnā vakṣyaty adhvaśramaparigataṃ sānumān āmrakūṭaḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:23: na kṣudro 'pi prathamasukṛtāpekṣayā saṃśrayāya prāpte mitre bhavati vimukhaḥ kiṃ punar yas tathoccaiḥ // KMdV_17 //
GK19kmeghvpu:24: channopāntaḥ pariṇataphaladyotibhiḥ kānanāmrais tvayy ārūḍhe śikharam acalaḥ snigdhaveṇīsavarṇe
GK19kmeghvpu:25: nūnaṃ yāsyaty amaramithunaprekṣaṇīyām avasthāṃ madhye śyāmaḥ stana iva bhuvaḥ śeṣavistārapāṇḍuḥ sthitvā tasmin vanacaravadhūbhuktakuñje muhūrtaṃ toyotsargadrutataragatis tatparaṃ vartma tīrṇaḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:26: revāṃ drakṣyasy upalaviṣame vindhyapāde viśīrṇāṃ bhakticchedair iva viracitāṃ bhūtim aṅge gajasya // KMdV_19 //
GK19kmeghvpu:27: tasyās tiktair vanagajamadair vāsitaṃ vāntavṛṣṭir jambūṣaṇḍapratihatarayaṃ toyam ādāya gaccheḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:28: antaḥsāraṃ ghana tulayituṃ nānilaḥ śakṣyati tvāṃ riktaḥ sarvo bhavati hi laghuḥ pūrṇatā gauravāya nīpaṃ dṛṣṭvā haritakapiśaṃ kesarair ardharūḍhair āvirbhūtaprathamamukulāḥ kandalīś cānukaccham
GK19kmeghvpu:29: dagdhāraṇyeṣv adhikasurabhiṃ gandham āghrāya corvyāḥ sāraṅgās te jalalavamucaḥ sūcayiṣyanti mārgam // KMdV_21 //
GK19kmeghvpu:30: utpaśyāmi drutam api sakhe matpriyārthaṃ yiyāsoḥ kālakṣepaṃ kakubhasurabhau parvate parvate te /
GK19kmeghvpu:31: śuklāpāṅgaiḥ sanayanajalaiḥ svāgatīkṛtya kekāḥ pratyudyātaḥ katham api bhavān gantum āśu vyavasyet pāṇḍucchāyopavanavṛtayaḥ ketakaiḥ sūcibhinnair nīḍārambhair gṛhabalibhujām ākulagrāmacaityāḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:32: tvayy āsanne phalapariṇatiśyāmajambūvanāntāḥ saṃpatsyante katipayadinasthāyihaṃsā daśārṇāḥ teṣāṃ dikṣu prathitavidiśālakṣaṇāṃ rājadhānīṃ gatvā sadyaḥ phalam avikalaṃ kāmukatvasya labdhā
GK19kmeghvpu:33: tīropāntastanitasubhagaṃ pāsyasi svādu yat tat sabhrūbhaṅgaṃ mukham iva payo vetravatyāś calormi nīcairākhyaṃ girim adhivases tatra viśrāmahetos tvatsamparkāt pulakitam iva prauḍhapuṣpaiḥ kadambaiḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:34: yaḥ paṇyastrīratiparimalodgāribhir nāgarāṇām uddāmāni prathayati śilāveśmabhir yauvanāni // viśrāntaḥ san vraja vananadītīrajātāni siñcann udyānānāṃ navajalakaṇair yūthikājālakāni /
GK19kmeghvpu:36: vakraḥ panthā yad api bhavataḥ prasthitasyottarāśāṃ saudhotsaṅgapraṇayavimukho mā sma bhūr ujjayinyāḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:37: vidyuddāmasphuritacakitais tatra paurāṅganānāṃ lolāpāṅgair yadi na ramase locanair vañcito 'si // KMdV_27 //
GK19kmeghvpu:39: nirvindhyāyāḥ pathi bhava rasābhyantaraḥ saṃnipatya strīṇām ādyaṃ praṇayavacanaṃ vibhramo hi priyeṣu // KMdV_28 //
GK19kmeghvpu:40: veṇībhūtapratanusalilāṃ tām atītasya sindhuṃ pāṇḍucchāyāṃ taṭaruhatarubhraṃśibhir jīrṇaparṇaiḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:41: saubhāgyaṃ te subhaga virahāvasthayā vyañjayantīṃ kārśyaṃ yena tyajati vidhinā sa tvayaivopapādyaḥ prāpyāvantīn udayanakathākovidagrāmavṛddhān pūrvoddiṣṭām anusara purīṃ śrīviśālāṃ viśālām
GK19kmeghvpu:42: svalpībhūte sucaritaphale svargiṇāṃ gāṃ gatānāṃ śeṣaiḥ puṇyair hṛtam iva divaḥ kāntimat khaṇḍam ekam // KMdV_30 //
GK19kmeghvpu:43: dīrghīkurvan paṭu madakalaṃ kūjitaṃ sārasānāṃ pratyūṣeṣu sphuṭitakamalāmodamaitrīkaṣāyaḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:44: yatra strīṇāṃ harati surataglānim aṅgānukūlaḥ siprāvātaḥ priyatama iva prārthanācāṭukāraḥ jālodgīrṇair upacitavapuḥ keśasaṃskāradhūmair bandhuprītyā bhavanaśikhibhir dattanṛttopahāraḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:45: harmyeṣv asyāḥ kusumasurabhiṣv adhvakhinnāntarātmā nītvā rātriṃ lalitavanitāpādarāgāṅkiteṣu bhartuḥ kaṇṭhacchavir iti gaṇaiḥ sādaraṃ dṛśyamāṇaḥ puṇyaṃ yāyās tribhuvanaguror dhāma caṇḍeśvarasya
GK19kmeghvpu:46: dhūtodyānaṃ kuvalayarajogandhibhir gandhavatyās toyakrīḍāniratayuvatisnānatiktair marudbhiḥ apy anyasmiñ jaladhara mahākālam āsādya kāle sthātavyaṃ te nayanaviṣayaṃ yāvad abhyeti bhānuḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:47: kurvan saṃdhyābalipaṭahatāṃ śūlinaḥ ślāghanīyām āmandrāṇāṃ phalam avikalaṃ lapsyase garjitānām pādanyāsakvaṇitaraśanās tatra līlāvadhūtai ratnacchāyākhacitavalibhiś cāmaraiḥ klāntahastāḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:48: veśyās tvatto nakhapadasukhān prāpya varṣāgrabindūn āmokṣyanti tvayi madhukaraśreṇidīrghān kaṭākṣān // KMdV_35 //
GK19kmeghvpu:49: paścād uccairbhujataruvanaṃ maṇḍalenābhilīnaḥ sāṃdhyaṃ tejaḥ pratinavajapāpuṣparaktaṃ dadhānaḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:50: nṛttārambhe hara paśupater ārdranāgājinecchāṃ śāntodvegastimitanayanaṃ dṛṣṭabhaktir bhavānyā gacchantīnāṃ ramaṇavasatiṃ yoṣitāṃ tatra naktaṃ ruddhāloke narapatipathe sūcibhedyais tamobhiḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:51: saudāminyā kanakanikaṣasnigdhayā darśayorvīṃ toyotsargastanitamukharo mā sma bhūr viklavās tāḥ // KMdV_37 //
GK19kmeghvpu:52: tāṃ kasyāṃ cid bhavanavalabhau suptapārāvatāyāṃ nītvā rātriṃ ciravilasanāt khinnavidyutkalatraḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:53: dṛṣṭe sūrye punar api bhavān vāhayed adhvaśeṣaṃ mandāyante na khalu suhṛdām abhyupetārthakṛtyāḥ tasmin kāle nayanasalilaṃ yoṣitāṃ khaṇḍitānāṃ śāntiṃ neyaṃ praṇayibhir ato vartma bhānos tyajāśu
GK19kmeghvpu:54: prāleyāsraṃ kamalavadanāt so 'pi hartuṃ nalinyāḥ pratyāvṛttas tvayi kararudhi syād analpābhyasūyaḥ gambhīrāyāḥ payasi saritaś cetasīva prasanne chāyātmāpi prakṛtisubhago lapsyate te praveśam
GK19kmeghvpu:55: tasmāt tasyāḥ kumudaviśadāny arhasi tvaṃ na dhairyān moghīkartuṃ caṭulaśapharodvartanaprekṣitāni tasyāḥ kiṃ cit karadhṛtam iva prāptavānīraśākhaṃ hṛtvā nīlaṃ salilavasanaṃ muktarodhonitambam
GK19kmeghvpu:56: prasthānaṃ te katham api sakhe lambamānasya bhāvi jñātāsvādaḥ pulinajaghanāṃ ko vihātuṃ samarthaḥ tvanniṣyandocchvasitavasudhāgandhasaṃparkapuṇyaḥ srotorandhradhvanitasubhagaṃ dantibhiḥ pīyamānaḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:57: nīcair vāsyaty upajigamiṣor devapūrvaṃ giriṃ te śīto vāyuḥ pariṇamayitā kānanodumbarāṇām // tatra skandaṃ niyatavasatiṃ puṣpameghīkṛtātmā puṣpāsāraiḥ snapayatu bhavān vyomagaṅgājalārdraiḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:58: rakṣāhetor navaśaśibhṛtā vāsavīnāṃ camūnām atyādityaṃ hutavahamukhe saṃbhṛtaṃ tadd hi tejaḥ jyotirlekhāvalayi galitaṃ yasya barhaṃ bhavānī putraprītyā kuvalayapadaprāpi karṇe karoti
GK19kmeghvpu:59: dhautāpāṅgaṃ haraśaśirucā pāvakes taṃ mayūraṃ paścād adrigrahaṇagurubhir garjitair nartayethāḥ ārādhyaivaṃ śaravaṇabhuvaṃ devam ullaṅghitādhvā siddhadvandvair jalakaṇabhayād vīṇibhir muktamārgaḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:60: vyālambethāḥ surabhitanayālambhajāṃ mānayiṣyan srotomūrtyā bhuvi pariṇatāṃ rantidevasya kīrtim tvayy ādātuṃ jalam avanate śārṅgiṇo varṇacaure tasyāḥ sindhoḥ pṛthum api tanuṃ dūrabhāvāt pravāham /
GK19kmeghvpu:61: prekṣiṣyante gaganagatayo dūram āvarjya dṛṣṭīr ekaṃ muktāguṇam iva bhuvaḥ sthūlamadhyendranīlam tām uttīrya vraja paricitabhrūlatāvibhramāṇāṃ pakṣmotkṣepād uparivilasatkṛṣṇaśāraprabhāṇām
GK19kmeghvpu:63: brahmāvartaṃ janapadam adhaśchāyayā gāhamānaḥ kṣetraṃ kṣatrapradhanapiśunaṃ kauravaṃ tad bhajethāḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:64: rājanyānāṃ śitaśaraśatair yatra gāṇḍīvadhanvā dhārāpātais tvam iva kamalāny abhyavarṣan mukhāni hitvā hālām abhimatarasāṃ revatīlocanāṅkāṃ bandhuprītyā samaravimukho lāṅgalī yāḥ siṣeve /
GK19kmeghvpu:65: kṛtvā tāsām abhigamam apāṃ somya sārasvatīnām antaḥsvacchas tvam api bhavitā varṇamātreṇa kṛṣṇaḥ // KMdV_49 //
GK19kmeghvpu:66: tasmād gaccher anukanakhalaṃ śailarājāvatīrṇāṃ jahnoḥ kanyāṃ sagaratanayasvargasopānapaṅktim
GK19kmeghvpu:67: gaurīvaktrabhrukuṭiracanāṃ yā vihasyeva phenaiḥ śambhoḥ keśagrahaṇam akarod indulagnormihastā tasyāḥ pātuṃ suragaja iva vyomni pūrvārdhalambī tvaṃ ced acchasphaṭikaviśadaṃ tarkayes tiryag ambhaḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:68: saṃsarpantyā sapadi bhavataḥ srotasi cchāyayā sā syād asthānopanatayamunāsaṃgam evābhirāmā āsīnānāṃ surabhitaśilaṃ nābhigandhair mṛgāṇāṃ tasyā eva prabhavam acalaṃ prāpya gauraṃ tuṣāraiḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:69: vakṣyasy adhvaśramavinayane tasya śṛṅge niṣaṇṇaḥ śobhāṃ ramyāṃ trinayanavṛṣotkhātapaṅkopameyām taṃ ced vāyau sarati saralaskandhasaṃghaṭṭajanmā bādhetolkākṣapitacamarīvālabhāro davāgniḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:70: arhasy enaṃ śamayitum alaṃ vāridhārāsahasrair āpannārtipraśamanaphalāḥ saṃpado hy uttamānām ye tvāṃ muktadhvanim asahanāḥ kāyabhaṅgāya tasmin darpotsekād upari śarabhā laṅghayiṣyanty alaṅghyam /
GK19kmeghvpu:71: tān kurvīthās tumulakarakāvṛṣṭihāsāvakīrṇān ke vā na syuḥ paribhavapadaṃ niṣphalārambhayatnāḥ tatra vyaktaṃ dṛṣadi caraṇanyāsam ardhendumauleḥ śaśvat siddhair upahṛtabaliṃ bhaktinamraḥ parīyāḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:72: yasmin dṛṣṭe karaṇavigamād ūrdhvam uddhūtapāpāḥ kalpante 'sya
GK19kmeghvpu:74: śabdāyante madhuram anilaiḥ kīcakāḥ pūryamāṇāḥ saṃraktābhis tripuravijayo gīyate kiṃnarībhiḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:75: nirhrādī te muraja iva cet kandarāsu dhvaniḥ syāt saṃgītārtho nanu paśupates tatra bhāvī samastaḥ prāleyādrer upataṭam atikramya tāṃs tān viśeṣān haṃsadvāraṃ bhṛgupatiyaśovartma yat krauñcarandhram
GK19kmeghvpu:76: tenodīcīṃ diśam abhisares tiryagāyāmaśobhī śyāmaḥ pādo baliniyamanābhyudyatasyeva viṣṇoḥ // gatvā cordhvaṃ daśamukhabhujocchvāsitaprasthasaṃdheḥ kailāsasya tridaśavanitādarpaṇasyātithiḥ syāḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:77: śṛṅgocchrāyaiḥ kumudaviśadair yo vitatya sthitaḥ khaṃ rāśībhūtaḥ pratiniśam iva tryambakasyāṭṭahāsaḥ utpaśyāmi tvayi taṭagate snigdhabhinnāñjanābhe sadyaḥkṛttadviradadaśanacchedagaurasya tasya
GK19kmeghvpu:78: līlām adreḥ stimitanayanaprekṣaṇīyāṃ bhavitrīm aṃsanyaste sati halabhṛto mecake vāsasīva // hitvā nīlaṃ bhujagavalayaṃ śambhunā dattahastā krīḍāśaile yadi ca viharet pādacāreṇa gaurī
GK19kmeghvpu:79: bhaṅgībhaktyā viracitavapuḥ stambhitāntarjalo 'syāḥ sopānatvaṃ kuru sukhapadasparśam ārohaṇeṣu tatrāvaśyaṃ janitasalilodgāram antaḥpraveśān neṣyanti tvāṃ surayuvatayo yantradhārāgṛhatvam
GK19kmeghvpu:80: tābhyo mokṣas tava yadi sakhe gharmalabdhasya na syāt krīḍālolāḥ śravaṇaparuṣair garjitair bhāyayes tāḥ // KMdV_61 //
GK19kmeghvpu:81: hemāmbhojaprasavi salilaṃ mānasasyādadānaḥ kurvan kāmāt kṣaṇamukhapaṭaprītim airāvaṇasya /
GK19kmeghvpu:82: dhunvan vātaiḥ sajalapṛṣataiḥ kalpavṛkṣāṃśukāni cchāyābhinnaḥ sphaṭikaviśadaṃ nirviśeḥ paravataṃ tam // KMdV_62 //
GK19kmeghvpu:83: tasyotsaṅge praṇayina iva srastagaṅgādugūlāṃ na tvaṃ dṛṣṭvā na punar alakāṃ jñāsyase kāmacārin
GK19kmeghvpu:84: yā vaḥ kāle vahati salilodgāram uccairvimānā muktājālagrathitam alakaṃ kāminīvābhravṛndam vidyutvantaṃ lalitavanitāḥ sendracāpaṃ sacitrāḥ saṃgītāya prahatamurajāḥ snigdhagambhīraghoṣam
GK19kmeghvpu:85: antastoyaṃ maṇimayabhuvas tuṅgam abhraṃlihāgrāḥ prāsādās tvāṃ tulayitum alaṃ yatra tais tair viśeṣaiḥ // KMdV_64 //
GK19kmeghvpu:86: haste līlākamalam alakaṃ bālakundānuviddhaṃ nītā rodhraprasavarajasā pāṇḍutām ānanaśrīḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:87: cūḍāpāśe navakuravakaṃ cāru karṇe śirīṣaṃ sīmante ca tvadupagamajaṃ yatra nīpaṃ vadhūnām // yasyāṃ yakṣāḥ sitamaṇimayāny etya harmyasthalāni jyotiśchāyākusumaracanāny uttamastrīsahāyāḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:88: āsevante madhu ratiphalaṃ kalpavṛkṣaprasūtaṃ tvadgambhīradhvaniṣu śanakaiḥ puṣkareṣv āhateṣu yatra strīṇāṃ priyatamabhujāliṅganocchvāsitānām aṅgaglāniṃ suratajanitāṃ tantujālāvalambāḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:89: tvatsaṃrodhāpagamaviśadaiś cotitāś candrapādair vyālumpanti sphuṭajalalavasyandinaś candrakāntāḥ netrā nītāḥ satatagatinā yad vimānāgrabhūmīr ālekhyānāṃ navajalakaṇair doṣam utpādya sadyaḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:90: śaṅkāspṛṣṭā iva jalamucas tvādṛśā yatra jālair dhūmodgārānukṛtinipuṇaṃ jarjarā niṣpatanti nīvībandhocchvasanaśithilaṃ yatra yakṣāṅganānāṃ vāsaḥ kāmād anibhṛtakareṣv ākṣipatsu priyeṣu
GK19kmeghvpu:91: arcistuṅgān abhimukham api prāpya ratnapradīpān hrīmūḍhānāṃ bhavati viphalapreraṇaś cūrṇamuṣṭiḥ gatyutkampād alakapatitair yatra mandārapuṣpaiḥ kḷptacchedyaiḥ kanakakamalaiḥ karṇavibhraṃśibhiś ca /
GK19kmeghvpu:92: muktālagnastanaparimalaiś chinnasūtraiś ca hārair naiśo mārgaḥ savitur udaye sūcyate kāminīnām matvā devaṃ dhanapatisakhaṃ yatra sākṣād vasantaṃ prāyaś cāpaṃ na vahati bhayān manmathaḥ ṣaṭpadajyam /
GK19kmeghvpu:93: sabhrūbhaṅgaprahitanayanaiḥ kāmilakṣyeṣv amoghais tasyārambhaś caturavanitāvibhramair eva siddhaḥ // KMdV_71 //
GK19kmeghvpu:94: tatrāgāraṃ dhanapatigṛhān uttareṇāsmadīyaṃ dūrāl lakṣyaṃ tad amaradhanuś cāruṇā toraṇena /
GK19kmeghvpu:95: yasyopānte kṛtakatanayaḥ kāntayā vardhito me hastaprāpyastavakanamito bālamandāravṛkṣaḥ // vāpī cāsmin marakataśilābaddhasopānamārgā haimaiḥ syūtā kamalamukulaiḥ snigdhavaiḍūryanālaiḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:96: yasyās toye kṛtavasatayo mānasaṃ saṃnikṛṣṭaṃ na dhyāsyanti vyapagataśucas tvām api prekṣya haṃsāḥ // KMdV_73 //
GK19kmeghvpu:97: yasyās tīre nicitaśikharaḥ peśalair indranīlaiḥ krīḍāśailaḥ kanakakadalīveṣṭanaprekṣaṇīyaḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:98: madgehinyāḥ priya iti sakhe cetasā kātareṇa prekṣyopāntasphuritataḍitaṃ tvāṃ tam eva smarāmi raktāśokaś calakisalayaḥ kesaraś cātra kāntaḥ pratyāsannau kuravakavṛter mādhavīmaṇḍapasya
GK19kmeghvpu:99: ekaḥ sakhyās tava saha mayā vāmapādābhilāṣī kāṅkṣaty anyo vadanamadirāṃ dohadacchadmanāsyāḥ tanmadhye ca sphaṭikaphalakā kāñcanī vāsayaṣṭir mūle naddhā maṇibhir anatiprauḍhavaṃśaprakāśaiḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:100: tālaiḥ śiñjadvalayasubhagair nartitaḥ kāntayā me yām adhyāste divasavigame nīlakaṇṭhaḥ suhṛd vaḥ // KMdV_76 //
GK19kmeghvpu:101: ebhiḥ sādho hṛdayanihitair lakṣaṇair lakṣaṇīyaṃ dvāropānte likhitavapuṣau śaṅkhapadmau ca dṛṣṭvā /
GK19kmeghvpu:102: kṣāmacchāyaṃ bhavanam adhunā madviyogena nūnaṃ sūryāpāye na khalu kamalaṃ puṣyati svām abhikhyām gatvā sadyaḥ kalabhatanutāṃ śīghrasaṃpātahetoḥ krīḍāśaile prathamakathite ramyasānau niṣaṇṇaḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:103: arhasy antarbhavanapatitāṃ kartum alpālpabhāsaṃ khadyotālīvilasitanibhāṃ vidyudunmeṣadṛṣṭim tanvī śyāmā śikharadaśanā pakvabimbādharauṣṭhī madhye kṣāmā cakitahariṇaprekṣaṇī nimnanābhiḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:104: śroṇībhārād alasagamanā stokanamrā stanābhyāṃ yā tatra syād yuvativiṣaye sṛṣṭir ādyeva dhātuḥ tāṃ jānīyāḥ parimitakathāṃ jīvitaṃ me dvitīyaṃ dūrībhūte mayi sahacare cakravākīm ivaikām
GK19kmeghvpu:105: gāḍhotkaṇṭhāguruṣu divaseṣv eṣu gacchatsu bālāṃ jātāṃ manye śiśiramathitāṃ padminīṃ vānyarūpām nūnaṃ tasyāḥ prabalaruditocchūnanetraṃ bahūnāṃ niḥśvāsānām aśiśiratayā bhinnavarṇādharauṣṭham
GK19kmeghvpu:106: hastanyastaṃ mukham asakalavyakti lambālakatvād indor dainyaṃ tvadupasaraṇakliṣṭakānter bibharti āloke te nipatati purā sā balivyākulā vā matsādṛśyaṃ virahatanu vā bhāvagamyaṃ likhantī /
GK19kmeghvpu:107: pṛcchantī vā madhuravacanāṃ śārikāṃ pañjarasthāṃ kac cid bhartuḥ smarasi nibhṛte tvaṃ hi tasya priyeti // KMdV_82 //
GK19kmeghvpu:108: utsaṅge vā malinavasane somya nikṣipya vīṇāṃ madgotrāṅkaṃ viracitapadaṃ geyam udgātukāmā /
GK19kmeghvpu:109: tantrīr ārdrā nayanasalilaiḥ sārayitvā kathaṃ cid bhūyo bhūyaḥ svayam api kṛtāṃ mūrcchanāṃ vismarantī // KMdV_83 //
GK19kmeghvpu:110: śeṣān māsān gamanadivasaprastutasyāvadher vā vinyasyantī bhuvi gaṇanayā dehalīdattapuṣpaiḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:111: saṃyogaṃ vā hṛdayanihitārambham āsvādayantī prāyeṇaite ramaṇaviraheṣv aṅganānāṃ vinodāḥ // ādye baddhā virahadivase yā śikhā dāma hitvā śāpasyānte vigalitaśucā yā mayonmocanīyā /
GK19kmeghvpu:112: sparśakliṣṭām ayamitanakhenāsakṛt sārayantīṃ gaṇḍābhogāt kaṭhinaviṣamād ekaveṇīṃ kareṇa // savyāpārām ahani na tathā khedayed viprayogaḥ śaṅke rātrau gurutaraśucaṃ nirvinodāṃ sakhīṃ te /
GK19kmeghvpu:113: matsaṃdeśaiḥ sukhayitum ataḥ paśya sādhvīṃ niśīthe tām unnidrām avaniśayanāsannavātāyanasthaḥ ādhikṣāmāṃ virahaśayane saṃnikīrṇaikapārśvāṃ prācīmūle tanum iva kalāmātraśeṣāṃ himāṃśoḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:114: matsaṃyogaḥ katham upanamet svapnajo 'pīti nidrām ākāṅkṣantīṃ nayanasalilotpīḍaruddhāvakāśām niḥśvāsenādharakisalayakleśinā vikṣipantīṃ śuddhasnānāt paruṣamalakaṃ nūnam āgaṇḍalambam /
GK19kmeghvpu:115: nītā rātriḥ kṣaṇa iva mayā sārdham icchāratair yā tām evoṣṇair virahaśayaneṣv asrubhir yāpayantīm pādān indor amṛtaśiśirāñjālamārgapraviṣṭān pūrvaprītyā gatam abhimukhaṃ saṃnivṛttaṃ tathaiva
GK19kmeghvpu:116: cakṣuḥ khedāt sajalagurubhiḥ pakṣmabhiś chādayantīṃ sābhre 'hnīva
GK19kmeghvpu:117: sthalakamalinīṃ na prabuddhāṃ na suptām // KMdV_89 //
GK19kmeghvpu:118: jāne sakhyās tava mayi manaḥ saṃbhṛtasneham asmād itthaṃbhūtāṃ prathamavirahe tām ahaṃ tarkayāmi
GK19kmeghvpu:119: vācālaṃ māṃ na khalu subhagaṃmanyabhāvaḥ karoti pratyakṣaṃ te nikhilam acirād bhrātar uktaṃ mayā yat // KMdV_90 //
GK19kmeghvpu:120: sā saṃnyastābharaṇam abalā pelavaṃ dhārayantī śayyotsaṅge nihitam asakṛd duḥkhaduḥkhena gātram
GK19kmeghvpu:121: tvām apy asraṃ navajalamayaṃ mocayiṣyaty avaśyaṃ prāyaḥ sarvo bhavati karuṇāvṛttir ārdrāntarātmā ruddhāpāṅgaprasaram alakair añjanasnehaśūnyaṃ pratyādeśād api ca madhuno vismṛtabhrūvilāsam
GK19kmeghvpu:122: tvayy āsanne nayanam uparispandi śaṅke mṛgākṣyā mīnakṣobhākulakuvalayaśrītulām eṣyatīti // vāmo vāsyāḥ kararuhapadair mucyamāno madīyair muktājālaṃ ciraparicitaṃ tyājito daivagatyā
GK19kmeghvpu:123: saṃbhogānte mama samucito hastasaṃvāhanānāṃ yāsyaty ūruḥ sarasakadalīstambhagauraś calatvam tasmin kāle jalada dayitā labdhanidrā yadi syād anvāsyaināṃ stanitavimukho yāmamātraṃ sahasva
GK19kmeghvpu:124: mā bhūd asyāḥ praṇayini mayi svapnalabdhe kathaṃ cit sadyaḥ kaṇṭhacyutabhujalatāgranthi gāḍhopagūḍham tām utthāpya svajalakaṇikāśītalenānilena pratyāśvastāṃ samam abhinavair jālakair mālatīnām
GK19kmeghvpu:125: vidyudgarbhe nihitanayanāṃ tvatsanāthe gavākṣe vaktuṃ dhīrastanitavacanair māninīṃ prakramethāḥ bhartur mitraṃ priyam avidhave viddhi mām ambuvāhaṃ tatsaṃdeśān manasi nihitād āgataṃ tvatsamīpam
GK19kmeghvpu:126: yo vṛndāni tvarayati pathi śrāmyatāṃ proṣitānāṃ mandrasnigdhair dhvanibhir abalāveṇimokṣotsukāni ity ākhyāte pavanatanayaṃ maithilīvonmukhī sā tvām utkaṇṭhocchvasitahṛdayā vīkṣya saṃbhāvya caiva /
GK19kmeghvpu:127: śroṣyaty asmāt param avahitā somya sīmantinīnāṃ kāntodantaḥ suhṛdupanataḥ saṃgamāt kiṃ cid ūnaḥ // KMdV_97 //
GK19kmeghvpu:128: tām āyuṣmān mama ca vacanād ātmanā copakartuṃ brūyād evaṃ tava sahacaro rāmagiryāśramasthaḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:129: avyāpannaḥ kuśalam abale pṛcchati tvāṃ viyuktaḥ pūrvāśāsyaṃ sulabhavipadāṃ prāṇinām etad eva aṅgenāṅgaṃ tanu ca tanunā gāḍhataptena taptaṃ sāsreṇāsradravam aviratotkaṇṭham utkaṇṭhitena
GK19kmeghvpu:130: uṣṇocchvāsaṃ samadhikatarocchvāsinā dūravartī saṃkalpais te viśati vidhinā vairiṇā ruddhamārgaḥ śabdākhyeyaṃ yad api kila te yaḥ sakhīnāṃ purastāt karṇe lolaḥ kathayitum abhūd ānanasparśalobhāt
GK19kmeghvpu:131: so 'tikrāntaḥ śravaṇaviṣayaṃ locanānām agamyas tvām utkaṇṭhāviracitapadaṃ manmukhenedam āha // KMdV_100 //
GK19kmeghvpu:132: śyāmāsv aṅgaṃ cakitahariṇaprekṣite dṛṣṭipātaṃ gaṇḍacchāyāṃ śaśini śikhināṃ varhabhāreṣu keśān
GK19kmeghvpu:133: utpaśyāmi pratanuṣu nadīvīciṣu bhrūvilāsān hantaikasthaṃ kva cid api na te bhīru sādṛśyam asti // KMdV_101 //
GK19kmeghvpu:134: tvām ālikhya praṇayakupitāṃ dhāturāgaiḥ śilāyām ātmānaṃ te caraṇapatitaṃ yāvad icchāmi kartum
GK19kmeghvpu:135: asrais tāvan muhur upacitair dṛṣṭir ālipyate me krūras tasminn api na sahate saṃgamaṃ nau kṛtāntaḥ // KMdV_102 //
GK19kmeghvpu:136: mām ākāśapraṇihitabhujaṃ nirdayāśleṣahetor labdhāyās te katham api sati svapnasaṃdarśaneṣu
GK19kmeghvpu:137: paśyantīnāṃ na khalu bahuśo na sthalīdevatānāṃ muktāsthūlās tarukisalayeṣv asruleśāḥ patanti bhittvā sadyaḥ kisalayapuṭān devadārudrumāṇāṃ ye tatkṣīrasrutisurabhayo dakṣiṇena pravṛttāḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:138: āliṅgyante guṇavati mayā te tuṣārādrivātāḥ pūrvaspṛṣṭaṃ yadi kila bhaved aṅgam ebhis taveti saṃkṣipyeran kṣaṇa iva kathaṃ dīrghayāmās triyāmāḥ sarvāvasthāsv ahar api kathaṃ mandamandātapaṃ syāt /
GK19kmeghvpu:139: itthaṃ cetaś caṭulanayane durlabhaprārthanaṃ me gāḍhoṣmābhiḥ kṛtam aśaraṇaṃ tvadviyogavyathābhiḥ nanv ātmānaṃ bahu vigaṇayann ātmanā nāvalambe tat kalyāṇi tvam api sutarāṃ mā gamaḥ kātaratvam
GK19kmeghvpu:140: kasyātyantaṃ sukham upanataṃ duḥkham ekāntato vā nīcair gacchaty upari ca daśā cakranemikrameṇa śāpānto me bhujagaśayanād utthite śārṅgapāṇau māsān anyān gamaya caturo locane mīlayitvā /
GK19kmeghvpu:141: paścād āvāṃ virahaguṇitaṃ taṃ tam ātmābhilāṣaṃ nirvekṣyāvaḥ pariṇataśaraccandrikāsu kṣapāsu bhūyaś cāha tvam api śayane kaṇṭhalagnā purā me nidrāṃ gatvā kim api rudatī sasvanaṃ viprabuddhā
GK19kmeghvpu:142: sāntarhāsaṃ kathitam asakṛt pṛcchataś ca tvayā me dṛṣṭaḥ svapne kitava ramayan kām api tvaṃ mayeti // KMdV_108 //
GK19kmeghvpu:143: etasmān māṃ kuśalinam abhijñānadānād viditvā mā kaulīnād asitanayane mayy aviśvāsinī bhūḥ
GK19kmeghvpu:144: snehān āhuḥ kim api virahahrāsinas te hy abhogād iṣṭe vastuny upacitarasāḥ premarāśībhavanti kac cit somya vyavasitam idaṃ bandhukṛtyaṃ tvayā me pratyākhyātuṃ na khalu bhavato dhīratāṃ tarkayāmi /
GK19kmeghvpu:145: niḥśabdo 'pi pradiśasi jalaṃ yācitaś cātakebhyaḥ pratyuktaṃ hi praṇayiṣu satām īpsitārthakriyaiva etat kṛtvā priyam anucitaprārthanāvartmano me sauhārdād vā vidhura iti vā mayy anukrośabuddhyā
